SELECT mdp.*, oc.grade_name AS gradeName, oc.current_price*10 AS currentPrice, oc.smallimg_path as smallImgPath, oc.collection as collection, oc.start_time as startTime, oc.city as courseAddress, oc.status as courseStatus, oc.multimedia_type as multimediaType, oba.content as articleContent, oba.type_id as typeId, oba.title as articleTitle, oba.img_path as articleImgPath, oba.status as articleStatus, mw.id as writingsId, oc.type as courseType, oc.is_teaching teaching, mtai.id as treatmentId, mtai.status as treatmentStatus, mtai.name as pupilName FROM medical_doctor_posts mdp LEFT JOIN oe_course oc ON oc.id = mdp.course_id LEFT JOIN medical_writings mw ON mw.article_id = mdp.article_id LEFT JOIN oe_bxs_article oba ON oba.id = mdp.article_id LEFT JOIN medical_treatment_appointment_info mtai ON mtai.id = oc.appointment_info_id
WHERE mdp.deleted = 0 and mdp.status = 1 and mdp.doctor_id=#{doctorId}
and oc.type = 1 and oc.multimedia_type != 2
and mdp.course_id is not null and oc.type !=1 and oc.multimedia_type !=2
and oba.type_id = 8
and oba.type_id != 8
and (mdp.type = 1 or mdp.type = 2 or mdp.type = 3)
and oc.type = 1 and oc.multimedia_type = 2
and mdp.product_id is not null
ORDER BY mdp.stick desc,mdp.create_time desc
